Text: I was never really a fan of Ivy largely because her face doesn't do it for me but I gave this video a shot and frankly I'm not disappointed in her. The beginning of course isn't believable but then who cares. The potential for fucking your girlfriend's sibling is hot off the bat and she's got a great body. The picture above doesn't do her justice. Besides that the guy's face was in so many shots it's a bit frustrating. Even worse is there's subtitles on this video. They're not the obscure letters at the bottom of the screen either; they're something like 24 font lower mid screen with a clear color where at one point they briefly block part of the creampie. It's like hey; I'm not watching this for the story, I mean, it helps a bit but I can think that kind of generic scenario up on my own so quit blocking the action with your terrible translations - example being the guy says "you feel good" after he creampies her and she plays with it a little. The video quality is awesome though and for that reason alone I do recommend it.
